items.name: Concrete
items.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

items.name: Iron Plate
items.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

items.name: Iron Rod
items.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

items.name: Power Shard
items.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

items.name: Packaged Fuel
items.description:
Fuel.
Packaged Fuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

items.name: Iodine Infused Filter
items.description: Used in hazmat suits to filter out radioactive particles in the air.

items.name: Spiked Rebar
items.description: Ammo for the Rebar Gun.

items.name: Cartridge
items.description: Ammo for the Rifle.

items.name: HUB Parts
items.description: The parts required to build the basic structure of the HUB.

items.name: Wire
items.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

items.name: Filter
items.description: Used in gas masks to filter out pollutants in the air.

items.name: Cable
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

items.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
items.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

items.name: Copper Ingot
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

items.name: Screw
items.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

items.name: Smart Plating
items.description: Project Part #1. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Versatile Framework
items.description: Project Part #2. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Automated Wiring
items.description: Project Part #3. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Modular Engine
items.description: Project Part #4. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Adaptive Control Unit
items.description: Project Part #5. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

items.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
items.description: Thin lightweight & highly durable sheet that is mainly used for products that need to be light or have high heat conduction.

items.name: Motor
items.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

items.name: Rubber
items.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

items.name: Circuit Board
items.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

items.name: Copper Sheet
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

items.name: Plastic
items.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

items.name: Encased Industrial Beam
items.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

items.name: Steel Pipe
items.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

items.name: Fuel
items.description: Fuel is either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

items.name: Polymer Resin
items.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

items.name: Heavy Oil Residue
items.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

items.name: Petroleum Coke
items.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

items.name: Modular Frame
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

items.name: Rotor
items.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

items.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
items.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport.

items.name: Alumina Solution
items.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into pure Aluminum.

items.name: Aluminum Scrap
items.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

items.name: A.I. Limiter
items.description: A.I. Limiter are super advanced electronics that are used to control A.I.s and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

items.name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
items.description: Control Rods regulate power expenditure via electromagnetism.

items.name: Stator
items.description: The static parts of a motor

items.name: Supercomputer
items.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

items.name: High-Speed Connector
items.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

items.name: Heavy Modular Frame
items.description: A more robust multi-purpose frame.

items.name: Aluminum Ingot
items.description: Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap. It is mostly used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

items.name: Quickwire
items.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

items.name: Silica
items.description: Derived from quartz, commonly used in structural materials and microelectronics.

items.name: Computer
items.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

items.name: Steel Beam
items.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

items.name: Caterium Ingot
items.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

items.name: Quartz Crystal
items.description: Used for radar and quantum technology.

items.name: Packaged Turbofuel
items.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in Fuel Generators and vehicles.

items.name: Empty Canister
items.description: Used to package fluids for transportation. Can be recycled.

items.name: Turbofuel
items.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in Fuel Generators and vehicles.

items.name: Crystal Oscillator
items.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

items.name: Sulfuric Acid
items.description: A liquid mostly used to extract elements from ore.

items.name: Black Powder
items.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used in explosives and cartridges.

items.name: Heat Sink
items.description: Used to dissipate heat faster.

items.name: Turbo Motor
items.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

items.name: Battery
items.description: Batteries store an electrical charge. They are primarily used as a power source.

items.name: Radio Control Unit
items.description: Enhances and directs radio signals

items.name: Nobelisk
items.description: Can be used with the Nobelisk Detonator to blow up cracked boulders, vegetation or other vulnerable targets.

items.name: Green Power Slug
items.description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

items.name: Yellow Power Slug
items.description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.

items.name: Purple Power Slug
items.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

items.name: Solid Biofuel
items.description:
Fuel.
The most energy efficient form of solid biomass.

items.name: Biomass
items.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy efficient than raw biological matter.

items.name: Leaves
items.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

items.name: Wood
items.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

items.name: Fabric
items.description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

items.name: Mycelia
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

items.name: Liquid Biofuel
items.description:
Fuel.
The most energy efficient form of biomass.

items.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
items.description:
Fuel.
Packaged Liquid Biofuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

items.name: Alien Carapace
items.description: Thick and sturdy natural armor plates from alien creatures.

items.name: Alien Organs
items.description: Organs from alien creatures.

items.name: Chainsaw
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Fuel: Biofuel

Used to clear an area of flora that is too difficult to remove by hand.

items.name: Factory Cart
items.description:
The one and only FICSIT Factory Cart
Now with special - FICIST Foundation only - Grip Wheels, for an even smoother and faster factory floor experience!

items.name: Hazmat Suit
items.description:
Slot: Body

Shields you from the adverse effects of radiation. 
Consumes Iodine INfused Filters from your inventory when you are in radioactive areas.

items.name: Jetpack
items.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to move more freely in the air. Consumes Fuel when used and refills with Fuel from your inventory when you're on the ground.

items.name: Blade Runners
items.description:
Slot: Body

A exoskeleton for your lower legs that assist your movement, allowing you to sprint faster and jump higher.
Also dampens the impact of landing.

items.name: Rebar Gun
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Spiked Rebar

Improvised ranged weapon for self defense. Has to be reloaded after each use.

items.name: Rifle
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Cartridge

Rapid fire weapon for self-defense. Has a mag size of 10.

items.name: Xeno-Zapper
items.description:
Slot: Hands

Standard issue electroshock self defense weapon for melee range.

items.name: Xeno-Basher
items.description:
Slot: Hands

Heavy electroshock self defense weapon for melee range.

items.name: Portable Miner
items.description:
Slot: Hands

Can be set up on a resource node to automatically extract the resource. Very limited storage space.

items.name: Object Scanner
items.description:
Slot: Hands

Scans the area for a set item. Beeps at a rate proportional to proximity and direction.

items.name: Gas mask
items.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to breathe normally in poison gas. Consumes Filters from your inventory when you are in poison gas.

items.name: Color Gun
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Color Cartridge

Paints factory buildings and vehicles. The color can be adjusted prior to painting.

items.name: Nobelisk Detonator
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Nobelisk

Used to blow up cracked boulders, rocks and invasive vegetation.

items.name: Water
items.description: It's water.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

items.name: Copper Ore
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

items.name: Limestone
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

items.name: Coal
items.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

items.name: Crude Oil
items.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

items.name: Bauxite
items.description: Bauxite is turned into Aluminum Ingots via an advanced smelting process.

items.name: Caterium Ore
items.description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

items.name: Uranium
items.description: Uranium is radioactive. Mainly used in Nuclear Power Plants.

items.name: Raw Quartz
items.description: Raw Quartz is processed into Quartz Crystals which are used for radar and quantum technology.

items.name: Sulfur
items.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Gunpowder.

items.name: Encased Uranium Cell
items.description:
Uranium Cells are concrete encased uranium pellets. Primarily used to make Nuclear Fuel Rods
Moderately radioactive.

items.name: Uranium Pellet
items.description:
Uranium Pellets are purified and casted from Uranium Ore. Primarily used to make Uranium Cells.
Moderately radioactive.

items.name: Compacted Coal
items.description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

items.name: Packaged Oil
items.description: Crude Oil, packaged for transportation or to be used as vehicle fuel.

items.name: Packaged Water
items.description: Water, packaged for alternative transport.

items.name: Nuclear Fuel Rod
items.description:
Nuclear Fuel Rods are used as fuel in nuclear reactors.
VERY RADIOACTIVE

items.name: Beacon
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Used to mark areas of interest. Displayed on your compass with the color and name you set for it.

items.name: Paleberry
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore one health segment.

items.name: Bacon Agaric
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore two health segments.

items.name: Beryl Nut
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore half a health segment.

items.name: Medicinal Inhaler
items.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be inhaled to fully restore health.

items.name: Parachute
items.description:
Slot: Body
Consumable

Slows down your fall when activated in mid-air.

buildings.name: Conveyor Pole
buildings.description:
Can be used as a connection for conveyor belts. The height of the pole can be adjusted.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

buildings.name: Conveyor Belt
buildings.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

buildings.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.5
buildings.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

buildings.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.2
buildings.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

buildings.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.3
buildings.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

buildings.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.4
buildings.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

buildings.name: Power Line
buildings.description: Used to connect Power Poles, Power Generators and Factory buildings.

buildings.name: Power Pole
buildings.description:
Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: Power Pole Mk.2
buildings.description:
Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: Power Pole Mk.3
buildings.description:
Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: The HUB
buildings.description: The heart of your factory. This is where you complete FICSIT milestones to unlock additional blueprints of buildings, vehicles, parts, equipment etc.

buildings.name: Foundry
buildings.description:
Smelts two resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the inputs. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

buildings.name: Smelter
buildings.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

buildings.name: Constructor
buildings.description:
Crafts one part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

buildings.name: Refinery
buildings.description:
Refines fluids or solids into more usable parts.

Has a pipe and conveyor belt output to handle potential by-products.

buildings.name: Assembler
buildings.description:
Crafts two parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

buildings.name: Manufacturer
buildings.description:
Crafts three or four parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

buildings.name: Space Elevator
buildings.description:
Funnel resources to complete Project Assembly.
Completing stages here allows you to unlock later tiers of milestones in the HUB.

buildings.name: Water Extractor
buildings.description:
Default extraction rate: 120k liter per minute.
Default pressure: 10, allowing a 10 meter vertical rise of fluids.

Extracts water from the body of water it is build on.
Note that the water needs to be deep enough and that rivesr do not commonly suffice.

buildings.name: Miner Mk.1
buildings.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

buildings.name: Oil Extractor
buildings.description:
Normal extraction rate: 120k liter per minute.
Default pressure: 10, allowing a 10 meter vertical rise of fluids.

Extracts Crude Oil from a Crude Oil node it is build on. Extraction rates depend on node purity.
Outputs all extracted Crude Oil from the pipe output connection.

buildings.name: Miner Mk.2
buildings.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

buildings.name: Miner Mk.3
buildings.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

buildings.name: Storage Container
buildings.description:
Contains 24 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has an input and output for conveyor belts.

buildings.name: Personal Storage Box
buildings.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

buildings.name: Industrial Storage Container
buildings.description:
Contains 48 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has two inputs and outputs for conveyor belts.

buildings.name: Craft Bench
buildings.description:
Allows you to manually craft a large range of different parts. 
These parts can then be used in construction of different factory buildings, vehicles and equipment.

buildings.name: Equipment Workshop
buildings.description: Used to manually craft equipment.

buildings.name: Double-sided Wall Power Pole
buildings.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: Double-sided Wall Power Pole Mk.2
buildings.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: Wall Power Pole
buildings.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: Wall Power Pole Mk.2
buildings.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: M.A.M.
buildings.description:
The Molecular Analysis Machine is used to break down matter for analysis.
R&D will assist Pioneers through the M.A.M to turn any valuable data into usable research options.

buildings.name: Conveyor Wall Mount
buildings.description: PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE

buildings.name: Pipeline Wall Support
buildings.description: PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE

buildings.name: Pipeline Wall Through Hole
buildings.description: PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE PROTOTYPE

buildings.name: Double-sided Wall Power Pole Mk.3
buildings.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: Wall Power Pole Mk.3
buildings.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

buildings.name: Biomass Burner
buildings.description:
Burns various forms of biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has no input and must therefore be fed biomass manually.

buildings.name: Coal Generator
buildings.description:
Burns coal to generate electricity for your power grid.
Has an input so feeding coal can be automated.

buildings.name: Fuel Generator
buildings.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for your power grid.
Has an input so feeding Fuel can be automated.

buildings.name: Fence
buildings.description: The Fence can be built on the edges of floors to prevent you from falling off.

buildings.name: Wall Conveyor Perpendicular
buildings.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection perpendicular to the wall.
Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Conveyor Perpendicular
buildings.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection perpendicular to the wall.
Height: 4

buildings.name: Window 8m x 4m 03
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Allows human beings to see through walls.

buildings.name: Window 8m x 4m 03
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Allows human beings to see through walls.

buildings.name: Wall 8m x 4m
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Useful for building multi-floor structures.

buildings.name: Wall 8m x 4m
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Useful for building multi-floor structures.

buildings.name: Wall Conveyor x3
buildings.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 3 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Conveyor x2
buildings.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 2 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Conveyor x1
buildings.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection.
Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Conveyor x3
buildings.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 3 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Conveyor x2
buildings.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 2 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Conveyor x1
buildings.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection.
Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Door Center
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Door Left
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Door Right
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Door Center
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Door Left
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Door Right
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Gate 8m x 4m
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Allows human beings to pass through walls.

buildings.name: Wall Window 8m x 4m 01
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Window 8m x 4m 02
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Wall Window 8m x 4m 04
buildings.description: Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.                                                                      Height: 4

buildings.name: Stairs
buildings.description: The Stairs allow you to move to the upper floors of your buildings. Height: 4

buildings.name: Stairs Left
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

buildings.name: Stairs Right
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

buildings.name: Conveyor Lift
buildings.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

buildings.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.5
buildings.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

buildings.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.2
buildings.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

buildings.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.3
buildings.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

buildings.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.4
buildings.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

buildings.name: Nuclear Power Plant
buildings.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce power.
Has a conveyor belt and pipeline input so loading can be automated.  
Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

buildings.name: Pipeline Support
buildings.description:
Can be used as a connection for pipelines. The height of the support can be adjusted.
Useful to route pipelines in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

buildings.name: Hyper Tube Support
buildings.description: Supports for Hyper Tubes to allow for longer distances.

buildings.name: Stackable Pipeline Support
buildings.description: Support for pipelines. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

buildings.name: Pipeline
buildings.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 5m liters per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

buildings.name: Pipeline Junction Cross
buildings.description: Can be attached to a pipeline to split it 4-way.

buildings.name: Pipeline Pump
buildings.description:
Applies 20 pressure, allowing a 20 meter vertical rise of fluids.
Can be attached to a pipeline to apply additional pressure.
Useful for overcoming verticality and balancing out throughput.

buildings.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
buildings.description:
Can contain up to 300m of fluid.
Has an in and output for pipes.

buildings.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
buildings.description:
Can contain up to 1200m of fluid.
Has an in and output for pipes.

buildings.name: Freight Platform
buildings.description:
As Freight Cars stop this they will either unload or load their goods, depending on what you've set it to.
The Freight Platform snaps to Railway, each other and Train Stations.

buildings.name: Freight Platform Liquid
buildings.description:
As Freight Cars stop this they will either unload or load their goods, depending on what you've set it to.
The Freight Platform snaps to Railway, each other and Train Stations.

buildings.name: Train Station
buildings.description:
Locomotives can be set to drive to and stop at the Train Station.
You can connect power to the train station to power up the trains on the railway as well as transport the power to other stations.

buildings.name: Railway
buildings.description:
Used to transport trains in a reliable and fast manner.
Has a wide turn angle so make sure to plan it out properly.

buildings.name: Foundation 8m x 1m
buildings.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

buildings.name: Foundation 8m x 2m
buildings.description:

Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

buildings.name: Ramp 8m x 1m
buildings.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

buildings.name: Corner Ramp Down 8m x 1m
buildings.description: The Ramps exist to make it easier to get up on Floors, either for vehicles or you. Height: 2

buildings.name: Foundation Glass
buildings.description:

buildings.name: Lookout Tower
buildings.description: Provides a good OVERVIEW useful for building.

buildings.name: Jump Pad
buildings.description:
Propels you upwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

buildings.name: Tilted Jump Pad
buildings.description:
Propels you forwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

buildings.name: U-Jelly Landing Pad
buildings.description:
Generates a speed dampening jelly.
Guarantees a soft landing.

buildings.name: Conveyor Merger
buildings.description: Merges up to three conveyor belts into one.

buildings.name: Conveyor Splitter
buildings.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
Useful to move parts and resources from oversaturated conveyor belts.

buildings.name: AWESOME Sink
buildings.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any useful part straight into research data, as fast as you can supply it! 
Participating empolyees will be compensated with Coupons to be spend at the AWESOME Shop.

buildings.name: AWESOME Shop
buildings.description:
Redeem your FICSIT Coupons here! 
For those employees going the extra kilometer we have set aside special bonus milestones and rewards! Get your Coupons in the AWESOME Sink program now!

*No refunds possible.

buildings.name: Conveyor Pole Stackable
buildings.description: Conveyor pole with fixed size that is stackable

buildings.name: Truck Station
buildings.description:
Either send or recieve resources to vehicles. Has an inventory with 48 slots.
Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicle. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type..

buildings.name: Hyper Tube Entrance
buildings.description: Used to enter and power a Hyper Tube.

buildings.name: Hyper Tube
buildings.description:
Tubes for transporting Ficsit employees.
Require a Hyper Tube Entrance to function and be entered.

buildings.name: Empty Platform
buildings.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

buildings.name: Smart Splitter
buildings.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set a rule for which part should go to the left and which part should go to the right.

buildings.name: Programmable Splitter
buildings.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set rules for each output to decide exactly where each part should go.

buildings.name: Geo Thermal Generator
buildings.description:
Can only be built on geyser nodes.
Generates electricity for your power grid.
Does not require any resources to be input.

buildings.name: Walkway Crossing
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

buildings.name: Walkway Ramp
buildings.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

buildings.name: Walkway Straight
